divs: Sighting Details1.I was in the south east part of detroit. I was walking in the street. i have a habit of looking at the sky all the time because I'm aware of the UFO phenomena and I've been interested in ET for 5 years. 2.I looked at the sky and noticed 6 objects that were chaotically moving then made a formation of 6 objects that looked like circles and in the triangular formation went faster. Nothing moves like that. It couldn't be terrestrial object or atmosphere phenomena. nothing moves like that. i wanted to take a pict but it was very dark and objects were flying fast.. i lost a sight went object accelerated their speed. they made a formation and accelerated so rapidly..
Summary: I was in the South Detroit area. I was looking at the sky and noticed 6 circle objects moving in the sky. Then they made a triangular formation and went fast.
